thito.beaconplus.xyz.xenondevs.particle.data.color

Class ParticleColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • thito.beaconplus.xyz.xenondevs.particle.data.ParticleData
      • thito.beaconplus.xyz.xenondevs.particle.data.color.ParticleColor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoteColor, RegularColor

    public abstract class ParticleColor
extends ParticleData
    The ParticleColor class is used to store the rgb values of colors and convert them into the corresponding nms objects.
    Since:
    10.06.2019
    Author:
    ByteZ
    See Also:
    PropertyType.COLORABLE

    • Method Detail

      • toNMSData

        public abstract java.lang.Object toNMSData()
        Converts the current ParticleData instance into nms data. If the current minecraft version was released before 1.13 a int array should be returned. If the version was released after 1.12 a nms "ParticleParam has to be returned.
        Specified by:
        toNMSData in class ParticleData
        Returns:
        the nms data.
